description:
Call Carla 0401 928 407 to see our other available apartments.

Positioned in the leafy suburb of Asquith, surrounded by beautiful nature reserves and close to train station and shops.
Internal 112sqm plus 65sqm external.

FEAUTURES:
- Northerly Aspect
- Huge Balcony
- Spacious Open Plan Living
- Ensuite
- Gas Cooking
- Dishwasher
- Dryer
- Floorboards
- Internal laundry
- Shadow Line Cornice
- Marble like finish Kitchen bench tops
- Ducted Air Conditioning
- Built-in Robes
- Secure parking
- Storage cage

EDUCATION
TOP PRIMARY AND SECONDARY SCHOOLS PLUS WORLD CLASS UNIVERSITY
St Patrick's Catholic Primary School Primary Catholic 0.14 km
Asquith Public School Primary Government 0.31 km
Asquith Girls High School Secondary Government 0.50 km
Asquith Boys High School Secondary Government 0.86 km
Hornsby North Public School Primary Government 1.02 km
Mount Colah Public School Primary Government 1.63 km
Hornsby Girls High School Secondary Government 2.26 km
Waitara Public School Primary Government 2.34 km
Barker College Combined Independent 3.03 km
Macquarie University 9.64 km
Western Sydney University Parramatta Campus 15.94 km

TRANSPORT AND ACCESSIBILITY
Bus Stop 20 m walking distance
592 Brooklyn to Mooney (Loop Service)
595 Hornsby to Mt Colah (Loop Service)
597 Hornsby to Berowra
Asquith Train Station 450 m walking distance
Hornsby Train Station 2.02 km

RETAIL AND AMENITY
Coles 300m walking distance
Westfield Hornsby 2.19 km
St Ives Shopping Village 6.65 km
Macquarie Centre 10.03 km

LEISURE
Asquith Golf Club 1.05 km
Hornsby Aquatic & Leisure Centre 2.07 km
Bobbin Head Marina and Picnic Ground 5.60 km
Apple Tree Creek 5.63 km

HEALTHCARE
Hornsby Ku-ring-gai Hospital 1.79 km
Lady Davidson Private Hospital 3.88 km

Call 0401 928 407 or email to have a look at floor plans and finishes.
Please list name and mobile number when enquiring so an agent can get back you as soon as possible.




"We have obtained all information in this document from sources we believe to be reliable; however, we cannot guarantee its accuracy. Prospective purchasers are advised to carry out their own investigations"
